text: Valerie Perrine (September 3, 1943 - October 10, 2024) was an American model and actress. She has been nominated for Academy Awards and Golden Globe Awards. She played Marcy, the wife of a corrupt policeman, in the 1982 movie The Border. She played Miss Eve Teschmacher in certain Superman movies, and Mona in Boiling Point, a 1993 thriller movie. Perrine was born in Galveston, Texas. title: Valerie Perrine
